column1: #              Upgrades labor_requirements-toy.csv with empirical and derived values from peer-reviewed
#              and extension literature. Crop-specific where data supports differentiation.
# UNITS: hours_per_unit as specified per unit type (per_hectare
# LOGIC: Field labor hours from FAO/Gezira benchmarks for semi-mechanized developing country operations.
#        Crop-specific harvest rates from UF IFAS
#        Management hours scaled for 500 ha community farm with 50-100 seasonal workers.
#        Agrivoltaic adjustments from ScienceDirect systematic reviews of AVS labor impacts.
# ASSUMPTIONS: Semi-mechanized field operations (tractor for tillage
#              Drip irrigation with fertigation. Hot arid climate
#              Processing occurs in covered facilities. 280 working days/year
#              Under-PV operations use elevated panel structures (5+ m clearance).
# DATA_QUALITY: MODERATE-HIGH. Field labor values are well-supported by multiple empirical sources.
#               Equipment maintenance values from industry standards. Management values derived from
#               FAO cooperative benchmarks. Agrivoltaic multipliers from limited but growing literature.
# SECTION 1: FIELD OPERATIONS (crop-specific where data supports it)
# SECTION 2: PROCESSING OPERATIONS (per kg fresh input)
# SECTION 5: LOGISTICS (see also distribution_labor-research.csv for farmgate detail)
# SECTION 6: MODEL PARAMETERS (aggregate constants for labor model)
